channel.title: Auto cache updater
channel.description: I want a cache where if i edit one file or add more models i don't have to make my players redownload the whole thing i want the cache just to update those specific files into the regular one... is there a way to do this? if so how?

item.title: Auto cache updater

item.description:
@cardguydude wrote:

I want a cache where if i edit one file or add more models i don’t have to make my players redownload the whole thing i want the cache just to update those specific files into the regular one… is there a way to do this? if so how?
